Pre-Game Insights: South Africa are comfortably placed at No. 3 in the points table with three wins in four games.
Bangladesh are struggling to be a serious contender, having lost three games - to England, New Zealand and India - after an opening victory against Afghanistan.
Heinrich Klaasen has been South Africa's best batter in ODIs this year, having made 725 runs at 55.76 with a strike rate of 139.43.
Mushfiqur Rahim has emerged as Bangladesh's top scorer and most dependable batter.
Others: The match was played at Wankhede, Mumbai
The match was a day-night game
The match was the 23rd of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
South Africa won the match by 149 runs
The match summary states that South Africa scored 382/5 and Bangladesh scored 233
